trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_OSEWYDOSEWYD_000_000<tab>I promise not to do a mischief upon you, royal sapling. This artful artisan is here to help!
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_OSEWYD_000_010<tab>Like I said, I make a habit of making weapons. Where you have the wherewithal, I've got the goods!
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_Q1_000_020<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_A1_000_021<tab>Exchange artifacts.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_A1_100_021<tab>Exchange copies of <var 1A 02 /var>Illumed Invocations<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_A1_000_022<tab>Request to keep your aetherpool gear.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_A1_000_023<tab>Forge an illumed aetherpool grip.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_A1_000_024<tab>Learn more.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_A1_000_025<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_OSEWYD_000_030<tab>You want to use the king's gift <var 1A 02 /var>outside<var 1A 01 /var> of the churches? Mmm...maybe when you're older!
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>You must clear the area beyond stone 30 and complete the subsequent quest in order to use aetherpool gear outside of Pilgrim's Traverse.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_OSEWYD_000_040<tab>You want things already!? But you've only just started exploring... And I don't feel like working...
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>You must clear the area beyond traverse stone 30 and complete the subsequent quest in order to forge illumed aetherpool grips.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_OSEWYD_000_050<tab>Hmm... You should put the king's gift to more use, fatten it up with the fruits of victory. It looks far too frail to survive my mischief.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>In order to forge an illumed aetherpool grip, both your illumed aetherpool weapon and armor must have attained a minimum strength of +10.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_OSEWYD_000_052<tab>Grand! Now to wiggle the memories of battle loose─just like working free a mortal's soul!

TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_Q2_000_053<tab>Forge an illumed aetherpool grip? <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The strength of your illumed aetherpool arm and armor will be reduced by 10.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_Q3_000_060<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_A3_000_061<tab>What is there to be found in the churches?
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_A3_000_062<tab>Can aetherpool arms be used outside of the churches?
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_A3_000_063<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_OSEWYD_000_070<tab>The ramshackle scraps of lives left behind. Pixies can weave a dream out of anything, but you mortals are so picky when it comes to gifts!
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_OSEWYD_000_071<tab>So bring me aether-rich shards from inside the church, and I'll use them to spin you glory out of glass.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_OSEWYD_000_072<tab>Neither will I refuse pretty pebbles or glamorous gobs. Whatever tickles my fancy will earn you an even trade!
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_OSEWYD_000_080<tab>Yes, but only with the help of Ose Wyd! The king's gift is glorious but also dangerously delicate. Left alone for long, it will become brittle as bark!
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_OSEWYD_000_081<tab>That's where I come in. With a flick of the wrist, I can pluck out its strongest moments and make them last for an age─wherever and whenever you need them!
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_SYSTEM_100_081<tab>You may use your illumed aetherpool weapon outside of Pilgrim's Traverse after clearing the area marked by stone 30 and completing the subsequent quest.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_SYSTEM_000_082<tab>However, you must first forge a sufficient number of illumed aetherpool grips.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_SYSTEM_000_083<tab>Forging one grip will reduce the strength of your illumed aetherpool arm and armor by 10.
TEXT_CTSDDD4REWARD_00944_SYSTEM_000_084<tab>Sacramental weapons may be obtained by clearing the area marked by stone 100 and enhancing your illumed aetherpool arm to +60 or above.
